name: Cutting ties
description:
It is better to cut ties than to let it suffocate you.

This piece is an ode to my personal experience as a sexual assault survivor. It happened when I was 7 and it took me years to comprehend what actually happened. When I was 21 I finally told my mother about it.Even now, more than a decade later, I still can't fathom why it happened to me. 

I am not the only one. 1 in 3 women globally experience domestic abuse, sexual or physical assault in their lifetime.

Listen to your daughter, your sister, your mother and the women around you. Help them cut their ties.

Audio: @tingkahlagu
